arts.ttl: Parma vs. Lecce: an early relegation battle
arts.sum: 27 official previous meetings between the two teams in Emilia: 13 Parma wins, 9 draws and 5 Lecce victories. Lecce, together with Genoa, Fiorentina, Pisa and Verona is among the Serie A 2025/26 teams still searching for their first win of the season.

arts.ttl: Parma vs. Lecce - prediction, team news, lineups
